Detailed Description

Class used to report runtime diagnostic and error messages.

) [protected]

Summary: Called to get a fully qualified file specification using the source path specified by the caller

Parameters:

  • lpszSource - the source path and/or name to use
  • bErrors - true if called for the error log file spec

void CReporter::OnDebug ( EReporterLevel  eLevel,
char *  pszModule,
char *  pszMethod,
char *  pszFormat,
va_list  paArgs 
) [protected]
void CReporter::OnDebug ( EReporterLevel  eLevel,
char *  pszModule,
char *  pszMethod,
char *  pszFormat,
va_list  paArgs 
) [protected]

Summary: Called to process a request to report a debug message

Parameters:

  • eLevel - the enumerated report level of the message
  • pszModule - the name of the calling module
  • pszMethod - the name of the calling method
  • pszFormat - the printf style format string
  • paArgs - list of arguments

Returns: None

Remarks: This method assumes the caller has already determined if debug reporting has been enabled.

  • pszModule - the name of the calling module
  • pszMethod - the name of the calling method
  • pszFormat - the printf style format string
  • paArgs - list of arguments

Returns: None
